overview: T.T. Boy and his mates are back out on the streets of Southern California's danker, darker neighborhoods, in search of for-rent pussy between the legs of sexy ethnic others. The on-the-stroll talent this time out is all of the Asian (or Asian-esque) variety, and all the featured specimens thereof are suitably cute and reasonably ardent.  Of especial note is T.T. Boy's tryst with Mia Smiles, which perhaps goes on a bit too long, but which is buoyed admirably by Boy's take-no-prisoners approach to ruttin', and the Annie Oakley-ish cowgirl proclivities apparently so central to Smiles' nature. Then there's Boy's closing romp with Jade, who looks about as Asian as a plate of tacos al pastor, but who is undeniably fresh, young and horny. Her 19-year-old enthusiasm and dark-eyed beauty make her scene a scorching winner.
title: Asian Street Hookers
